channel.title: PK shop messed up?
channel.description: i did everything in here http://www.runelocus.com/forums/showthread.php?2763-317-Adding-Pk-Points-also-making-a-shop-for-it and whenever i try to buy something with pk points i need coins and pk points but when i have enough of each it says i don't have enough pk points. EX. Item is deathcape for 350 pk points but it says 350 coins when you check the price, If i have 350 coisn and 350 pk points or more it won't let me buy it. It says i don't have enough

item.title: PK shop messed up?
item.dc:creator: @demps2k9 demps2k9
item.description:
@demps2k9 wrote:

You have this error because:

  1. You added the code incorrectly.
  2. You added the codes in the wrong places.
  3. That tutorial is missing key things.

I can help you through TeamViewer but it would have to be tomorrow as I am rather busy and I need some sleep.

Read full topic
